alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, Union, Bergen, Essex, Queens, Richmond, Bronx, Kings, Rockland, southern Westchester, New York (Manhattan) and southwestern Nassau Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Telemark to near Robertsville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Paterson, Elizabeth, Flatbush, New Rochelle, Flushing, Passaic, Bayonne, Wayne, Mott Haven, Hoboken and Plainfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southern Westchester
